Is the `recoveridentity` method only available through the `curl` command?

No, the `recoveridentity` method is not only available through the `curl` command. The provided example shows that it can also be used with the `verus` command, as shown in `verus recoveridentity '{"name" : "myname"}'`.

Examples:
```bash
> verus recoveridentity '{"name" : "myname"}'
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "recoveridentity", "params": ['{"name" : "myname"}'] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```
